page.title: 19FARMERS DAY
page.content: The farmer{gets up at about 6:30a.m. and gets the cows in.He puts them in a cattle yard.{He milks the cows getting {them in 4 by 4.}He puts the cows back in the fields.Then he goes indoors and has his breakfast.For breakfast he has cereal and bread.Then he feeds all the livestock.In the night if sheep are lambing we have to get up in the middle of the night and put the{sheep and the lambs into a pen of their own.When it is hot and dry he goes making hay bales.The farmer drives the tractor baleing the hay.When he is on a long drive on a tractor he checks the oil.He goes to bed at about 10:30.p.m.
